name: Single Strike Urshifu
description: Inhabiting the mountains of a distant region, this Pokémon races across sheer cliffs, training its legs and refining its moves.

attacks.name: Field Crush
attacks.effect: If your opponent has a Stadium in play, discard it.

attacks.name: Fists of Strife
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 100 more damage.
